```{r include = FALSE}
# Load libraries & set plot theme
library(here)
library(ggpol)
library(tsibble)
library(feasts)
library(fable)
library(fabletools)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
# Set custom theme for plots
theme_strokes <- function() {
  theme_classic() %+replace%
    theme(
      axis.title = element_blank(),
      axis.line = element_blank(),
      axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
      plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, hjust = 0, vjust = 0.5)
    )
}

theme_set(theme_strokes())
```

```{r include = FALSE}
# Read in cleaned stroke data
activity_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/activity_hb.csv")) %>%
  filter(admission_type == "All")
activity_ca <- read_csv(here("data/clean/activity_ca.csv")) %>%
  filter(admission_type == "All")
mortality_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/mortality_hb.csv"))
mortality_ca <- read_csv(here("data/clean/mortality_ca.csv"))
```

```{r}
# Read in cleaned population data
pop_total_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/population_total_hb.csv"))
pop_ages_hb <- read_csv(here("data/clean/population_ages_hb.csv"))
pop_total_ca <- read_csv(here("data/clean/population_total_ca.csv"))
pop_ages_ca <- read_csv(here("data/clean/population_ages_ca.csv"))
```



```{r}
# Summary of total number of stroke discharges by type
activity_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" &
           admission_type == "All" &
           age_group == "All" &
           sex == "All" &
           year == 2018) %>%
  group_by(diagnosis, sex, age_group) %>%
  summarise(discharges = sum(number_of_discharges))
```

```{r}
# Summary of total number of stroke deaths by type
mortality_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" &
           age_group == "All" &
           sex == "All" &
           year == 2018) %>%
  group_by(year, sex, diagnosis) %>%
  summarise(total_deaths = sum(number_of_deaths))
```

```{r}
# Total discharges split by diagnosis, 2018
activity_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
         & age_group == "All"
         & sex == "All"
         & year == "2018") %>%
  group_by(diagnosis) %>%
  summarise(discharges = sum(number_of_discharges)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(
    x = reorder(diagnosis, discharges),
    y = discharges
  ) +
  geom_col(fill = "violetred4") +
  labs(title = "Total number of discharges in Scotland, 2018") +
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = scales::comma,
    limits = c(0, 35000)
  ) +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
# Total discharges split by diagnosis, 2018
mortality_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" &
    age_group == "All" &
    sex == "All" &
    year == "2018") %>%
  group_by(diagnosis) %>%
  summarise(deaths = sum(number_of_deaths)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(
    x = reorder(diagnosis, deaths),
    y = deaths
  ) +
  geom_col(fill = "violetred4") +
  labs(title = "Total number of deaths in Scotland, 2018") +
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = scales::comma,
    limits = c(0, 4500)
  ) +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
# Total discharges by sex, diagnosis, age_group
activity_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
         & !age_group %in% c("All", "under75 years")
         & sex != "All"
         & year == "2018") %>%
  group_by(diagnosis, sex, age_group) %>%
  summarise(discharges = sum(number_of_discharges)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(
    x = age_group,
    y = discharges,
    fill = sex
  ) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  labs(title = "Total number of discharges in Scotland, 2018") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Male" = "darkblue",
      "Female" = "skyblue"
    )
  ) +
  theme(
    axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_blank()
  ) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~diagnosis)
```

```{r}
# Total deaths by sex, diagnosis, age_group
mortality_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
         & !age_group %in% c("All", "under75 years") 
         & sex != "All" 
         & year == "2018") %>%
  group_by(diagnosis, sex, age_group) %>%
  summarise(deaths = sum(number_of_deaths)) %>%
  ggplot() +

    x = age_group,
    y = deaths,
    fill = sex
  ) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  labs(title = "Total number of deaths in Scotland, 2018") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma) +
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "Male" = "darkblue",
      "Female" = "skyblue"
    )
  ) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~ diagnosis, ncol = 2)
```


```{r}
pop_ages_hb %>%
  filter(year == 2018 &
    sex != "All" &
    hb_name == "Scotland") %>%
  group_by(sex, age_band1) %>%
  summarise(total_pop = sum(count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = age_band1,
    fill = sex,
    y = ifelse(test = sex == "Male",
      yes = -total_pop,
      no = total_pop
    )
  )) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme(
    panel.grid.major.x = element_line(linetype = "solid"),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  labs(title = "Population of Scotland, 2018") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "skyblue")) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = c(
      -200000, -150000, -100000, -50000, 0,
      50000, 100000, 150000, 200000
    ),
    labels = c(
      "200k", "150k", "100k", "50k", "0",
      "50k", "100k", "150k", "200k"
    )
  ) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE)) +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
# Mortality rates
mortality_hb %>%
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" &
    !age_group %in% c("All", "under75 years") &
    sex != "All" &
    year == "2018") %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = age_group,
    y = easr,
    colour = sex
  )) +
  geom_point(
    fill = "white",
    size = 4,
    alpha = 0.8
  ) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "skyblue")) +
  labs(
    title = "Standardised Mortality Rates, Scotland 2018",
    subtitle = "deaths per 100,000, using European Standard Population"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~diagnosis, scales = "free_y", ncol = 2)
```


```{r}
# Health board population
pop_total_hb %>%
  filter(year == 2018 &
    sex == "All" &
    age == "all_ages" &
    hb_name != "Scotland") %>%
  group_by(hb_name) %>%
  summarise(total_pop = sum(count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = reorder(hb_name, total_pop),
    y = total_pop
  )) +
  labs(title = "Health board populations, 2018") +
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = scales::comma,
    limits = c(0, 1300000)
  ) +
  geom_col(fill = "violetred4") +
  coord_flip()
```


```{r}
# Health Board comparison

mortality_hb %>%
  filter(age_group == "75plus years" &
    sex == "All" &
    year == "2018" &
    diagnosis == "Stroke") %>%
  ggplot(aes(
    x = reorder(hb_name, easr),
    y = easr,
    group = hb_name
  )) +
  geom_point(
    size = 3,
    colour = "violetred4"
  ) +
  geom_segment(aes(
    x = reorder(hb_name, easr),
    xend = reorder(hb_name, easr),
    y = 0,
    yend = easr
  ),
  linetype = "dashed",
  size = 0.1
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Standardised stroke mortality rates, age 75+ 2018",
    subtitle = "deaths per 100,000, using European Standard Population"
  ) +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
#Make Scotland activoty data into a tsibble
activity_ts_sco <- activity_hb %>% 
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
         & sex != "All"
         & !age_group %in% c("under75 years", "All")
         & diagnosis == "Stroke")

activity_ts_sco <- as_tsibble(activity_ts_sco, key = c(age_group, sex), index = year)
activity_ts_sco
```

```{r}
activity_ts_sco %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year,
      y = easr,
      colour = sex) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "skyblue")) +
  labs(
    title = "Standardised Discharge Rates, Scotland 2009 - 2018",
    subtitle = "discharges per 100,000, using European Standard Population"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~ age_group, scales = "free")
```

```{r}
# Make Scotland mortality data into a tsibble
mortality_ts_sco <- mortality_hb %>% 
  filter(hb_name == "Scotland" 
         & sex != "All"
         & !age_group %in% c("under75 years", "All")
         & diagnosis == "Stroke")

mortality_ts_sco <- as_tsibble(mortality_ts_sco, key = c(age_group, sex), index = year)
```

```{r}
mortality_ts_sco %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year,
      y = easr,
      colour = sex) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_blank()
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "skyblue")) +
  labs(
    title = "Standardised Mortality Rates, Scotland 2009 - 2018",
    subtitle = "discharges per 100,000, using European Standard Population"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~ age_group, scales = "free")
```

```{r}
fit <- mortality_ts_sco %>%
  filter(age_group == "75plus years") %>% 
  model(
   ets = ETS(easr),
   arima = ARIMA(easr)
   )

forecast_1 <- fit %>%
  forecast(h = 20)
```

```{r}
forecast_1 %>%
  autoplot(mortality_ts_sco) +
  ggtitle("Forecasts of standardised mortality rates (age 75+)") +
  facet_grid(~ sex)
```
